a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in per capita CO₂ emissions and GDP

Consumption-based emissions
include those from
fossil fuels and industry
. Land-use change emissions are not
Data source: World Bank (2023); Global Carbon Budget (2024); Population based on various sources (2024)
Note: GDP figures are adjusted for inflation.
